WorkItem.Description:
Sometimes the Relative Stat Value shows haste above mastery, probably because it's close to give rupture another tick or something. Therefore the Deft Ember Topaz can be a viable choice at specific times.
An example where haste is valued more than mastery is the attached assassination rogue.
WorkItem.Summary: [Rogue] Add Agility + Haste gem to Gemming Templates

Comments.Message:
I didn't know how haste affected rupture, so I assumed that haste was above mastery because of another tick. I just tested it and noticed that haste didn't affect the number of ticks, it lowered the total uptime. So I guess Rawr tries to balance haste and mastery out a bit since more haste gives more Venemous Wounds' ticks and mastery increases the damage of VW.
That makes haste even more interesting compared to mastery, and I believe the Deft Ember Topaz is more viable than I thought earlier.
Or not, my testing was terribly wrong. It didn't work that way, I must've done something wrong and I'll say that I was tired and blame it on that.
